app_descript:
App Name: WeDraw

Brief: WeDraw is an intuitive and user-friendly app designed to guide users through sketching an array of characters from the realms of anime, cartoons, and manga. It's well-suited for individuals of all skill levels, particularly those who are new to drawing, offering an easy entry point to the art world. With categories expanding beyond character art to include animals and vehicles, WeDraw ensures there's something for everyone, and with offline capabilities, you can practice your art anytime, anywhere.
